formattedText.part1: I am from Nepal and came to Japan 14 years ago, graduating from Aichi Bunkyo University after attending Japanese language school and vocational school.
formattedText.part2: After that, through working at Japanese companies, I deeply learned Japanese society, culture, and business manners. I have now acquired Japanese nationality and built a life foundation in Japan.
formattedText.part3: As the CEO of One Step Co., Ltd., I support foreign job seekers and company recruitment activities. Utilizing my own experience, I provide support while carefully addressing anxieties and challenges caused by language and cultural differences.
formattedText.part4: We value support that looks toward "trust-based encounters" and "long-term success" rather than just personnel introduction.

formattedText.part1: I came to Japan 14 years ago and graduated from Aichi Bunkyo University after attending Japanese language school and vocational school. After that, I got a job at a company and, while deeply experiencing Japanese society and culture, my attachment to Japan grew stronger, and I eventually acquired Japanese nationality.
formattedText.part2: Since 2023, I have started my own business, and through my experience working at companies and starting businesses, I have personally felt challenges such as "labor shortage" and "difficulty for foreigners to find jobs."
formattedText.part3:
With the thought that I could become a "bridge" for such challenges, I established
"One Step Co., Ltd."
formattedText.part4: I speak four languages: Japanese, Nepali, English, and Hindi, and provide global support connecting diverse talent and companies.

infoTitle.title: CEO Message
infoTitle.description: One Step Co., Ltd. is a bridge connecting international talent and Japanese companies. Through language education and life support, we create a future where foreigners can work and live with peace of mind.
infoTitle.highlightText: We support each person's 'first step' from the heart.

ceoMessage.part1: I once came to Japan as a foreigner and experienced various difficulties such as language barriers, cultural differences, and job hunting challenges. Learning Japanese, job hunting, and workplace adaptationâ€”none of these were easy paths, but I overcame each one to become who I am today. That's why I am confident that I can empathize with and support the anxieties and expectations of those who want to work in Japan more than anyone else.
ceoMessage.part2: Also, for companies, I believe there are various concerns and challenges when hiring foreigners, such as insufficient understanding of language, culture, and systems. We at One Step Co., Ltd. are committed to carefully bridging such "invisible walls" and "misunderstandings" and realizing trustworthy and secure matching.
ceoMessage.part3: From the position of someone who has already adapted to Japanese society, I will provide not just personnel introduction, but also detailed support that looks toward "post-employment retention" and "long-term success" for new graduates and those working in Japan for the first time.
ceoMessage.part4: I will support each person's "Precious First Step" with all my heart.

meta.description: Frequently asked questions about One Step's services for job seekers and companies. Find answers to common questions about our employment placement services.

infoTitle.title: Frequently Asked Questions
infoTitle.highlightText: "Please check here first for any questions about our services."

jobSeekers.question: Is the service free to use?
jobSeekers.answer: Yes, we do not charge any fees from job seekers. From counseling to job introductions and post-employment follow-up, everything is available free of charge.

jobSeekers.question: I'm still a student, can I register?
jobSeekers.answer: Yes, you can register. We can provide career consultations with an eye toward post-graduation and introduce internships, so please feel free to consult with us.

jobSeekers.question: I'm not confident in Japanese, is that okay?
jobSeekers.answer: Please don't worry. We will introduce jobs that match your language level. We also support business Japanese training and interview preparation. First, please let us know your current level.

jobSeekers.question: What is the process after registration?
jobSeekers.answer: After registration, a specialized career consultant will first conduct an interview to understand your wishes and experience. Then, we will introduce job openings that match you, and after document review and interview preparation, you will proceed to interviews with companies.

jobSeekers.question: Do you provide visa support?
jobSeekers.answer: Yes, we also provide support for residence status matters such as procedures for switching to work visas after receiving job offers. We work with specialists to help with smooth procedures.

companies.question: What is the process for requesting personnel?
companies.answer: Please contact us first through our inquiry form. Our staff will conduct a detailed interview about your company's hiring challenges and desired candidate profile, and propose the best personnel introduction and plan.

companies.question: What types of positions can you introduce personnel for?
companies.answer: We handle a wide range of positions including IT engineers, administrative staff, manufacturing/logistics, sales/customer service, interpretation/translation, etc. We particularly excel at introducing excellent foreign talent with high motivation to work in Japan.

companies.question: Can you handle urgent requests (short-term dispatch, etc.)?
companies.answer: Yes, we can. We can respond quickly to your needs such as urgent vacancy filling or short-term staff for busy periods only. Please feel free to consult with us first.

companies.question: What is the fee structure?
companies.answer: For personnel introduction, it is a success-based fee, and for personnel dispatch, the fee is based on the actual working hours of dispatched staff. Details will be quoted after understanding your requirements.

companies.question: Is it possible to switch from dispatch to full-time employment (introduction-expected dispatch)?
companies.answer: Yes, it is possible. By using our "introduction-expected dispatch" service, you can switch to direct employment by mutual agreement after working as dispatched staff for a certain period. This is used by many companies as an effective means to prevent mismatches.

meta.description: One Step Co., Ltd. privacy policy and basic principles for personal information protection. We are committed to protecting your privacy and earning your trust.
meta.keywords: privacy policy, personal information protection, One Step, data protection

infoTitle.title: Personal Information Protection Basic Policy
infoTitle.description: One Step Co., Ltd. pledges to pay maximum attention to personal information protection and to be a company that responds to the trust of the individual.
infoTitle.highlightText: Respect for privacy. That is the beginning of trust.

privacy.introduction: One Step Co., Ltd. deeply recognizes that personal information constitutes important information that makes up privacy, and believes that all personal information must be handled carefully under the principle of respecting individual dignity. In order to become a company that is trusted, loved, and proud of itself by all people including customers and business partners (hereinafter collectively referred to as "the individual"), we establish the following basic policy and strive for personal information protection.

section1.title: 1. Purpose of Use of Personal Information
section1.content: When we receive personal information, we will use it within the scope of the purpose that was clearly stated when the personal information was provided.

section2.title: 2. Disclosure of Personal Information to Third Parties
section2.content1: We will not disclose personal information to any third party except in the following cases:
list: When there is consent from the individual
When we determine that it is appropriate for our affiliated companies or agents to respond or handle inquiries from the individual

When it is necessary to disclose to business contractors or cooperating companies who have concluded confidentiality agreements in advance for the implementation of the collection purpose clearly stated to the individual
When it is necessary to disclose personal information to financial institutions for payment of fees for product purchases or services
When disclosure is made in a state where the individual cannot be identified (statistical materials, etc.)
When disclosure to third parties is permitted by laws, guidelines, etc.
section2.content2: In addition, when we provide or entrust personal information held by our company to third parties, we will give sufficient consideration to the selection of the provider or contractor, and strive to provide necessary supervision to ensure that appropriate and reliable protection measures are taken in the same manner as our handling.

section3.title: 3. Management of Personal Information
section3.content: We will appropriately manage the individual's personal information and take preventive measures and security measures against unauthorized access, loss, destruction, falsification, and leakage of personal information. We will also continue to implement in-house education regarding the protection and appropriate handling of personal information.

section4.title: 4. Inquiries Regarding Personal Information
section4.content: When an individual wishes to inquire, modify, or delete their own personal information, we will respond promptly based on our prescribed procedures.

section5.title: 5. Compliance with Laws and Standards and Review
section5.content: We will comply with applicable laws and standards regarding personal information and strive for continuous improvement and enhancement of personal information protection efforts.
